resources.string: When medicines are no longer needed, it is important to dispose of them properly to help reduce harm from accidental exposure or intentional misuse....
Drug side effects are unwanted or unexpected drug reactions. Ask your health care professional about any possible side effects and what, if any steps should be taken to reduce the risk....
Every time you receive a refill, look at the medication before you leave the pharmacy to make sure it looks the same as what you had before....
Why is it so important to take my medications?\n\nTaking medication exactly as your doctor recommends is not always as simple as it may seem....
If you are taking any sort of medication, it\'s recommended that you avoid alcohol, which can increase or decrease the effect of many drugs....

Use MedsTracker to:

• Post photos of your daily medication
 • Go to “Your Drugs” to create a new reminder include a title, description, and daily dose of your medication
 • Go to “Add Photo” to add a photo of your medication so that you\’ll know you’re taking the correct medication.
 • Guide tab is a helpful guide to avoid drug interaction. Our information is FDA approved.
 • Phone tab is a helpful tool to add contacts in case of an emergency. An example would be your family doctor or a relative.

• Application Developed By Sobhi and Mike
 • Logo Created By Sobhi Houri
 • Other images are Public Domain
